thread.title: Spar recalls thousands of sandwiches containing BLUE MEAT
thread.title_full: Spar recalls thousands of sandwiches containing BLUE MEAT

title: Spar recalls thousands of sandwiches containing BLUE MEAT

organizations.name: gns triple blt/chicken salad/ham & cheese sandwich
spar & honest crust chicken salad sandwich

text: Share this article Share Those affected by the incident include the Spar & Honest Crust Chicken/Stuffing Barm, Spar & Honest Crust Chicken Salad Sandwich and the Spar & Honest Crust Chicken Stuffing Sandwich. Others which are also being recalled are the GNS Triple BLT/Chicken Salad/Ham & Cheese Sandwich, the GNS Chicken/Pesto/Tomato Sub Roll and the GNS Chicken/Bacon/Mayo Sub Roll. A Food Standards Agency spokesman said: 'If you have bought any of the above products do not eat it. Instead, return it to the store from where it was bought for a full refund.'
